summary: Tested icons management migration from /admin/icons to /api/admin-ui/dashboard/icons. All core features working: login, sidebar navigation, icons page loads with 73 icons, create/edit dialogs with color picker and icon picker, filter/search functionality. Stats cards not visible (possibly auth issue with /api/attribute-icons/stats endpoint).

minor.issue: Stats not loading on frontend - requires auth, may have token issue

integration_issues.issue: Stats cards (Total, Active, Category Icons, Attribute Icons) not rendered - stats API may not be returning data due to auth

action_items: Investigate why stats cards are not displaying - check if admin_token is being properly sent to /api/attribute-icons/stats
Consider making stats endpoint public or ensure token is correctly retrieved from localStorage
critical_code_review_comments: Icons page correctly implemented at /app/admin-dashboard/frontend/src/app/dashboard/icons/page.tsx (907 lines)
Sidebar layout correctly updated with 'Attribute Icons' menu item using InterestsOutlined icon
Create/Edit dialog has all required fields: Name, Attribute Name, Icon Type, Category, Icon Color (8 swatches + hex input), Description
Icon picker shows grid of Ionicons with search functionality
Table displays icons with proper columns and edit/delete actions
Backend routes at /app/backend/routes/attribute_icons.py properly implemented with CRUD operations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Icons management successfully migrated to Next.js admin dashboard. All CRUD operations work through dialogs. Stats cards not visible - may need to debug auth token for /api/attribute-icons/stats. Icon picker shows ~100 Ionicons. Color picker has 8 predefined swatches (Green, Blue, Purple, Red, Orange, Teal, Brown, Blue Grey) plus custom hex input.

verified_features.icons_table: PASS - 73 icons displayed with all columns
verified_features.create_icon_dialog: PASS - all fields present (Name, Attribute Name, Icon, Icon Type, Category, Color picker, Description)
verified_features.edit_icon_dialog: PASS - pre-populated with icon data, Update button
verified_features.stats_cards: NOT VISIBLE - stats not loading (minor issue)
